extendedInfo.description: This is high quality animated live wallpaper of the fire sky! Very realistic smoke and flames, really amazing!Enjoy!Installation instructions:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live WallpapersScroll down the list, find out the wallpaper and setup it.Note: It is live wallpaper so you can't open the app, you will need to follow the instruction above in order to set the wallpaper. Also slower/older devices (shipped with Android OS below 2.1) can't run it too.

reviews.title: I really like it.!
reviews.comment: It\'s there any way to add options to it, like changing the color of the flames, smoke, ash.... that would be really awesome, OR maybe keep this one as is and make a separate app with them options, without the ads, but make that one cost, for people to buy.!? I know I would purchase it, and I think others would also.!! ;) Just a suggestion and request.! Thank you for making this, and for it being free.! ~Yvonne<3
reviews.author: yvonne goritski

reviews.title: Poor graphic
reviews.comment: Not really good, graphic is crap
reviews.author: Chu Jones

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Airpush and ad-supported. Not realistic flames as described.
reviews.author: A Google User
